001package org.nasdanika.persistence;
002
003import java.net.MalformedURLException;
004import java.net.URL;
005import java.util.function.Function;
006
007import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
008import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
009import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource;
010import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceFactoryImpl;
011import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil;
012import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
013import org.nasdanika.common.DiagnosticException;
014import org.nasdanika.common.MutableContext;
015import org.nasdanika.common.NasdanikaException;
016import org.nasdanika.common.NullProgressMonitor;
017import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
018import org.nasdanika.common.Status;
019
020/**
021 * Creates {@link YamlResource}
022 * @author Pavel
023 *
024 */
025public abstract class ObjectLoaderResourceFactory extends ResourceFactoryImpl {
026        
027        @Override
028        public Resource createResource(URI uri) {
029                return new ObjectLoaderResource(uri) {
030
031                        @Override
032                        protected ObjectLoader getObjectLoader() {
033                                return ObjectLoaderResourceFactory.this.getObjectLoader(this);
034                        }
035
036                        @Override
037                        protected ProgressMonitor getProgressMonitor() {
038                                return ObjectLoaderResourceFactory.this.getProgressMonitor(this);
039                        }
040
041                        @Override
042                        protected Context getContext() {
043                                return ObjectLoaderResourceFactory.this.getContext(this);
044                        }
045
046                        @Override
047                        protected void onDiagnostic(org.nasdanika.common.Diagnostic diagnostic) {
048                                ObjectLoaderResourceFactory.this.onDiagnostic(getURI(), diagnostic);                            
049                        }
050
051                        @Override
052                        protected boolean isJsonObject() {
053                                return ObjectLoaderResourceFactory.this.isJsonObject(this);
054                        }
055
056                        @Override
057                        protected boolean isJsonArray() {
058                                return ObjectLoaderResourceFactory.this.isJsonArray(this);
059                        }
060
061                        @Override
062                        protected Storable toStorable(EObject eObj) {
063                                return ObjectLoaderResourceFactory.this.toStorable(this, eObj);
064                        }
065                        
066                };
067        }
068        
069        protected boolean isJsonObject(Resource resource) {
070                URI uri = resource.getURI();
071                if (uri != null) {
072                        String lastSegment = uri.lastSegment();
073                        return lastSegment != null && lastSegment.toLowerCase().endsWith(".json");
074                }
075                return false;
076        }
077
078        protected boolean isJsonArray(Resource resource) {
079                return false;
080        }
081
082        protected Storable toStorable(Resource resource, EObject eObj) {
083                return (Storable) EcoreUtil.getRegisteredAdapter(eObj, Storable.class);
084        }
085        
086        
087        protected abstract ObjectLoader getObjectLoader(Resource resource);
088        
089        protected ProgressMonitor getProgressMonitor(Resource resource) {
090                return new NullProgressMonitor();
091        }
092        
093        protected Context getContext(Resource resource) {
094                return Context.EMPTY_CONTEXT;
095        }
096                
097        /**
098         * Called by the supplier factory.
099         * @param diagnostic
100         */
101        protected void onDiagnostic(URI uri, org.nasdanika.common.Diagnostic diagnostic) {
102                if (diagnostic.getStatus() == Status.FAIL || diagnostic.getStatus() == Status.ERROR) {
103                        System.err.println("***********************");
104                        System.err.println("*      Diagnostic     *");
105                        System.err.println("***********************");
106                        diagnostic.dump(System.err, 4, Status.FAIL, Status.ERROR);
107                }
108                if (diagnostic.getStatus() != Status.SUCCESS) {
109                        throw new DiagnosticException(diagnostic);
110                };
111        }
112        
113        /**
114         * Override to customize resource context, e.g. add uri-based properties or services.
115         * This imple
116         * @param uri
117         * @return
118         */
119        protected Context resourceContext(Resource resource) {
120                MutableContext ret = getContext(resource).fork();
121
122                Function<String, URL> resolver = path -> {
123                        try {
124                                return new URL(new URL(resource.getURI().toString()), path);
125                        } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
126                                throw new NasdanikaException("Cannot resolve '" + path + "' relative to " + resource.getURI() + ": " + e, e);
127                        }
128                };
129                
130                ret.put("embedded-image", org.nasdanika.common.Util.createEmbeddedImagePropertyComputer(resolver));
131                ret.put("embedded-image-data", org.nasdanika.common.Util.createEmbeddedImageDataPropertyComputer(resolver));
132                ret.put("include", org.nasdanika.common.Util.createIncludePropertyComputer(resolver));
133                ret.put("include-markdown", org.nasdanika.common.Util.createIncludeMarkdownPropertyComputer(resolver));
134                
135                return ret;
136        }       
137        
138}
